variables.input:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| fields TransactionID
| summarize distinctTransactionIDS = collectDistinct(TransactionID)
| expand distinctTransactionIDS
//| sort distinctTransactionIDS asc
| fieldsAdd distinctTransactionIDS = array("ALL", distinctTransactionIDS)

0.title: Revenue
0.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| summarize {Revenue = takeAny(Revenue)},
            by:{TransactionID, timestamp}
| makeTimeseries Revenue = sum(Revenue)

1.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*")
| filter in($TransactionID, "ALL") or in(TransactionID, $TransactionID)
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop1_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-1", timestamp),
            hop2_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-2", timestamp),
            hop3_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-3", timestamp),
            hop4_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-4", timestamp),
            hop5_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-5", timestamp),
            hop6_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-6", timestamp)
| summarize {TransactionStart = takeLast(timestamp),
            TransactionEnd =  takeFirst(timestamp),
            PurpleMonkeyDishwasherID = takeAny(PurpleMonkeyDishwasherID),
            Revenue = takeAny(Revenue),
            Errors = sum(Errors),
            DistinctTransactionIDs = countDistinct(TransactionID),
            `Hop-1` = takeAny(hop1_timestamp),
            `Hop-2` = takeAny(hop2_timestamp),
            `Hop-3` = takeAny(hop3_timestamp),
            `Hop-4` = takeAny(hop4_timestamp),
            `Hop-5` = takeAny(hop5_timestamp),
            `Hop-6` = takeAny(hop6_timestamp)},
            by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd EndToEnd = TransactionEnd-TransactionStart,
            `Hop-1` = `Hop-2`-`Hop-1`,
            `Hop-2` = `Hop-3`-`Hop-2`,
            `Hop-3` = `Hop-4`-`Hop-3`,
            `Hop-4` = `Hop-5`-`Hop-4`,
            `Hop-5` = `Hop-6`-`Hop-5`
| fieldsAdd Duplicates = if(DistinctTransactionIDs > 6, "YES", else:"NO")
| filter Errors == 0 and Revenue > 0  
| fields    Status = if((toLong(EndToEnd) > 5000000000) or (Duplicates == "YES"), "ðŸ”´", else:"ðŸŸ¢"), 
            TransactionStart,
            TransactionID,
            PurpleMonkeyDishwasherID,
            Revenue,
            EndToEnd,
            `Hop-1`,
            `Hop-2`,
            `Hop-3`,
            `Hop-4`,
            `Hop-5`           
| sort TransactionStart desc

2.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| summarize {Revenue = takeAny(Revenue)},
            by:{TransactionID, 
                timestamp}
| summarize  Revenue = sum(Revenue)

3.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| summarize {transactionStart = takeLast(timestamp)},
            by:{TransactionID}
| summarize Total = count()

5.title: Transaction Volume
5.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| summarize {transactionStart = takeLast(timestamp),
             Success = countIf(Errors == 0),
             Failed = countIf(Errors == 1)},
            by:{TransactionID,timestamp}           
| makeTimeseries  Success = sum(Success), Failed = sum(Failed)

7.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") and status == "ERROR"
| summarize Errors = count()

9.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop1_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-1", timestamp),
            hop6_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-6", timestamp)            
| summarize {transactionStart = takeAny(hop1_timestamp),
            transactionEnd =  takeAny(hop6_timestamp)},
            by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd totalTime = transactionEnd-transactionStart
| summarize EndToEnd = avg(totalTime)

10.title: End to End Transaction Time
10.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop1_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-1", timestamp),
            hop6_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-6", timestamp)            
| summarize {transactionStart = takeAny(hop1_timestamp),
            transactionEnd =  takeAny(hop6_timestamp),
            sla = avg(sla),
            hop1 = takeAny(hop1_timestamp),
            hop6 = takeAny(hop6_timestamp)},
            by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd totalTime = transactionEnd-transactionStart
| summarize {totalTime = avg(totalTime)},  
            by:{timestamp = transactionStart}

| makeTimeseries EndToEndTime = avg(totalTime)

11.title: Hop Time
11.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop1_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-1", timestamp),
            hop2_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-2", timestamp),
            hop3_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-3", timestamp),
            hop4_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-4", timestamp),
            hop5_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-5", timestamp),
            hop6_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-6", timestamp)
            
| summarize {transactionStart = takeLast(timestamp),
            transactionEnd =  takeFirst(timestamp),
            `Hop-1` = takeAny(hop1_timestamp),
            `Hop-2` = takeAny(hop2_timestamp),
            `Hop-3` = takeAny(hop3_timestamp),
            `Hop-4` = takeAny(hop4_timestamp),
            `Hop-5` = takeAny(hop5_timestamp),
            `Hop-6` = takeAny(hop6_timestamp)},
            by:{TransactionID}

| fieldsAdd `Hop-1` = `Hop-2`-`Hop-1`,
            `Hop-2` = `Hop-3`-`Hop-2`,
            `Hop-3` = `Hop-4`-`Hop-3`,
            `Hop-4` = `Hop-5`-`Hop-4`,
            `Hop-5` = `Hop-6`-`Hop-5`
            
| summarize {`Hop-1` = avg(`Hop-1`),
             `Hop-2` = avg(`Hop-2`),
             `Hop-3` = avg(`Hop-3`),
             `Hop-4` = avg(`Hop-4`),
             `Hop-5` = avg(`Hop-5`)},  
             by:{timestamp = transactionStart}

| makeTimeseries `Hop-1` = avg(`Hop-1`),
                 `Hop-2` = avg(`Hop-2`),
                 `Hop-3` = avg(`Hop-3`),
                 `Hop-4` = avg(`Hop-4`),
                 `Hop-5` = avg(`Hop-5`)

12.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop1_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-1", timestamp),
            hop2_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-2", timestamp)
| summarize {transactionStart = takeLast(timestamp),
            transactionEnd =  takeFirst(timestamp),
            purpleMonkeyDishwasherID01 = takeAny(purpleMonkeyDishwasherID01),
            `Hop-1` = takeAny(hop1_timestamp),
            `Hop-2` = takeAny(hop2_timestamp)},
            by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd `Hop-1` = `Hop-2`-`Hop-1`
| summarize `Hop-1` = avg(`Hop-1`)

13.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop2_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-2", timestamp),
            hop3_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-3", timestamp)
| summarize {`Hop-2` = takeAny(hop2_timestamp),
             `Hop-3` = takeAny(hop3_timestamp)},
             by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd `Hop-2` = `Hop-3`-`Hop-2`
| summarize `Hop-2` = avg(`Hop-2`)

14.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop3_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-3", timestamp),
            hop4_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-4", timestamp)
| summarize {`Hop-3` = takeAny(hop3_timestamp),
             `Hop-4` = takeAny(hop4_timestamp)},
             by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd `Hop-3` = `Hop-4`-`Hop-3`
| summarize `Hop-3` = avg(`Hop-3`)

15.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop5_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-5", timestamp),
            hop6_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-6", timestamp)
| summarize {`Hop-5` = takeAny(hop5_timestamp),
             `Hop-6` = takeAny(hop6_timestamp)},
             by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd `Hop-5` = `Hop-6`-`Hop-5`
| summarize `Hop-5` = avg(`Hop-5`)

16.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd hop4_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-4", timestamp),
            hop5_timestamp = if(Hop == "Hop-5", timestamp)
| summarize {`Hop-4` = takeAny(hop4_timestamp),
             `Hop-5` = takeAny(hop5_timestamp)},
             by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd `Hop-4` = `Hop-5`-`Hop-4`
| summarize `Hop-4` = avg(`Hop-4`)

17.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*") 
| sort timestamp desc
| parse content, """DATA ('transactionid>'| 'transactionid": "'| 'valid,' | 'internalizedTracking#:' | 'transactionid">PMW-' | 'originialTransactionId": "') LD:TransactionID ('<'| '"' | ',')"""
| parse content, """DATA ('DEVICE0'| ',device0'| 'hopMessage": "hop #' | 'hopMessage": "hop ' ) LD:hop ('<'| '"' | ',')"""
| parse content, """DATA 'transactionValue: ' FLOAT:revenue """
| parse content, """ DATA 'purpleMonkeyDishwasherId": "' LD:purpleMonkeyDishwasherID01 '"' """
| fieldsAdd Errors = if(status == "ERROR", 1, else:0)
| fieldsAdd hop1_timestamp = if(hop == "1", timestamp),
            hop2_timestamp = if(hop == "2", timestamp),
            hop3_timestamp = if(hop == "3", timestamp),
            hop4_timestamp = if(hop == "4", timestamp),
            hop5_timestamp = if(hop == "5", timestamp),
            hop6_timestamp = if(hop == "6", timestamp)

| summarize {TransactionStart = takeLast(timestamp),
            TransactionEnd =  takeFirst(timestamp),
            DistinctTransactionIDs = countDistinct(TransactionID)},
            by:{TransactionID}
| fieldsAdd Duplicates = if(DistinctTransactionIDs > 6, 1, else:0)
| summarize Duplicates = sum(Duplicates)

18.query:
fetch logs
| filter matchesValue(log.source, "/var/log/multilog/*")
| filter in($TransactionID, "ALL") or in(TransactionID, $TransactionID)
| sort timestamp desc
| summarize {TransactionStart = takeLast(timestamp),
            TransactionEnd =  takeFirst(timestamp),
            PurpleMonkeyDishwasherID = takeAny(PurpleMonkeyDishwasherID),
            Revenue = takeAny(Revenue),
            Errors = sum(Errors),
            ErrorCode = collectDistinct(ErrorCode),
            ErrorMessage = collectDistinct(ErrorMessage),
            ErrorHop = collectDistinct(if(isNotNull(ErrorCode), Hop)),
            DistinctTransactionIDs = countDistinct(TransactionID)},
            by:{TransactionID}
| filter Errors > 0
| fields Status =  "ðŸ”´",
         TransactionStart,
         TransactionEnd,
         TransactionID,
         PurpleMonkeyDishwasherID,
         ErrorCode,
         ErrorMessage,
         ErrorHop
| sort TransactionStart desc
